title: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of Rahul Gandhi smoking; here’s the fact check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture has surfaced the internet in which Congress leader Rahul Gandhi can be seen smoking on the edge of a wall.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: This picture of policemen holding stones is OLD

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture in which it was a random man smoking and NOT Rahul Gandhi.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that Rahul Gandhi’s face was superimposed on the original picture to create a FAKE image.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
